subject: This is what I did so far and tbh it sucks

conversations.body_text: Hi breakman200,  Please provide your order number so we can help check whether the baseplate was not shipped due to a stock issue. If it was indeed missed, we will arrange a reshipment for you immediately.

Order number :112-7225017-8653065

On Thu, Jun 19, 2025, 12:11 AM service@simsonn.com
ID 号为 587 和 708 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单587  
      主题: Base plate did not come  
      描述:  So I ordered yalls pedals with the baseplate combo so I could have the base plate to take with me as a potable option and keep my rig mobile, but when I received the package the one thing I really wanted with the pedals never arrived, I got the pedals and they are fantastic, but I litterally have nothing to use with them except a wooden board set up I had made from scraps of heavy wood,     
 Would there be anything yall can do for me?

合并来自工单708  
      主题: So.... any news?  
      描述:  I sent the order number, but haven't heard back?
Hi breakman200, We are sorry for the inconvenience caused to you. We have re-sent you the base plate today. Here is your waybill number: JSEXQ2378259696YQ. The shipping carrier is JSEXPRESS
